VASSAL.launch

Class ModuleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • VASSAL.launch.ModuleManager

  • public class ModuleManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Tracks recently-used modules and builds the main GUI window for interacting with modules.
    Since:
    3.1.0
